channel.title: Web Client Problem
channel.description:
when the client downloads the cache it starts at 0% and eventually reaches 100% but then it says "Unpacking Files" Then flashes "Client Updated - Please Reload Client" Then says "Connection Error Retrying in #"
I reload client and it dose exact same thing.... Any idea as to why this is happening
